Title: A Murloc and a Dragon Walk into a Time Rift...
Description:
Grurguglg.

Guuglrllghulgrgl grugll gur. Murgllgllrugl guglrllg murgu gruggullgl. Murglgurrrr gurgll Gurlgul, guruuuurllgr gurgull gurgllglrl  .

Argurgulul?

<You aren't certain what's being said. This world's version of Alexstrasza is handing you an hourglass and miming flipping it. It is probably of interest to Soridormi.>
ObjectivesText: Bring the Azmerlothian Hourglass to Soridormi in the Tyrhold Reservoir.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Return the item to Soridormi in the Tyrhold Reservoir.
